document_data.name: Red Sashes
document_data.mainbody: The '''Red Sashes''' were a vigilante group that was based in [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Organization: The individual cells of the Sashes, one for each ward of the city, each answered to an authority known only as [[Durnan|"The One"]].
document_data.Activities: Not an impulsive or excessively violent group, the Red Sashes aimed to arrest the guilty and free the innocent, typically when the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]] failed in these aims.
document_data.Membership: Prospective members were approached by the Red Sashes and were forced to swear a loyalty oath to "The One". These invitations were only given after approval of the member was reached after much observation. Members were not allowed to reveal any secrets of the group to outsiders and had to pay a 5 [[currency|gold piece]] per-month membership fee.
document_data.\"The One\": Only a few of the [[Lords of Waterdeep]] were aware of "The One's" true identity. These included [[Mirt]], [[Nymara Scheiron|Kitten]], [[Nindil Jalbuck|Nindil]], [[Sammereza Sulphontis|Sammereza]] and, before his death, [[Khelben "Blackstaff" Arunsun]].
document_data.History:
[[File:Red Sashes member.jpg|thumb|A member of the Red Sashes.]]
The Red Sashes were formed by [[Durnan]] in [[1312 DR]] to fulfill his own personal needs.
